short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Copy Link' button to Gmail messages which generates a direct link back to the email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a 'Copy Link' button to Gmail messages to create a direct link back to the email. This is useful when you want a refer back to an email from another tool.

Open Source at: https://github.com/matthewmueller/gmail-copy-email-link
